title: Ping is unusually high??!!
body:
My normal ping is 24 but it jumped to the 80's today and I can feel so much lag in game and doesn't feel right at all. Is anyone having similar issues?? 
I know its championships but that shouldn't have anything to do with the unusual high ping.

replies.body: yes mine is normally 33 but jumps to 11000 in some games making the game completely unplayable.
Thank god its not only me I wonder whats up.

Latency (ping) issues such as this are usually caused by ISP routing changes to the specific server you're accessing. We can definitely take a look at your route, but I'd like you to first ensure your network settings local to your PC match those listed in our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

If your latency is still sitting at 80 after taking those steps, please let me know.
